snippet.name: GETTER - SETTER
snippet.starttext:
<!--- * FUNCTION: Set$${Variable Name:} * insert description here * @return $${Return Type:any|array|binary|boolean|date|guid|numeric|query|string|struct|uuid|xml|void} : return desc ---> <cffunction name="Set$${Variable Name:}" access="public" returntype="$${Return Type:any|array|binary|boolean|date|guid|numeric|query|string|struct|uuid|xml|void}" output="false" displayname="Set$${Variable Name:}" hint="Sets the variable $${Variable Name:}">
</cffunction>
<!--- * FUNCTION: Get$${Variable Name:} * insert description here * @return $${Return Type:any|array|binary|boolean|date|guid|numeric|query|string|struct|uuid|xml|void} : return desc ---> <cffunction name="Get$${Variable Name:}" access="public" returntype="$${Return Type:any|array|binary|boolean|date|guid|numeric|query|string|struct|uuid|xml|void}" output="false" displayname="Get$${Variable Name:}" hint="Gets the variable $${Variable Name:}.">
</cffunction>
